code_value: Questions 1~2 Professor Wang is going to give a speech on animal protection. You are interested in it and ask your teacher two questions about it.</br> Questions 3~4 Your uncle has to go for a business trip and he wants you to take care of his pet dog. You ask your uncle about dog care.
Questions 1~2 Professor Wang is going to give a speech on animal protection. You are interested in it and ask your teacher two questions about it.
